Reviews.Title: Galaxy tablet 8.9
Reviews.Author: Boinger
Reviews.Content: I am just learning to use this tablet.  I  am trying to find out if the glass is gorilla glass and I still do  not know. (Does anyone know?) Setting up the apps took a lot of patience particularly Google and Nook.  Thanks to persistence from my wife we were successful.  The tablet runs fast and is easy to handlle.  The leather case I got from Amazon is nice but adds weight and is cumbersome.  I would recommend just getting a gel cover providing the glass is Gorilla glass from Corning.The Samsung is very nice and perhaps equal to Apple 2.  The size is near perfect and easier to handle than a larger tablet.  .  Now that the Samsung is running correctly, I love it.  I recommend this 8.9 to anyone that wants a tablet that is larger, runs on Android, ( better than a Kindle or Nook,) and not difficult to handle.  Hope you have a lovely wife to assist with setting up!Update:  After several days of use, I love this table even more.  I have installed several free apps and this was quite easy.  Battery life seems to be quite long.  After further research, I do not believe the glass is Gorilla from Cornng.

Reviews.Title: Better than any tablet on the market
Reviews.Author: Ola Seif
Reviews.Content: Samsung tab Galaxy 8.9 is the most balanced tab on the market. I've been using it for college and wotk for the past month and it's just a gem. Now it's indispensable and i take it with me wherever i go because of it's comapct design that fits in briefcase or purse discretly.Highly recommended.Plus a great variety of open source softwares available from Android free.

Reviews.Title: A NICE ANDROID TABLET
Reviews.Author: W. HUDA
Reviews.Content: Initially I faced problem as it was set on Chinese language but later I managed to change the input language to English through settings and its working fine. It works nice with 2G, 3G and Wi Fi connections.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet to own..
Reviews.Author: Bala Chami
Reviews.Content: I have been using this new tab for 4-5 days and I love it.. There is absolutely no issue that I can find and it is a highly recommended product.. For this price with 3G is a very good deal.. Go for it.. it wont disappoint you at all..

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: Hi,I got my tab yesterday and it is the same as i wanted it. It was unlocked and 16gb.  I have been addicted to it since yday itself.Its perfect for reading and watching videos and there are unlimited apps which can suit your requirements.i am really happy with this tab.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Tab 8.9 3G
Reviews.Author: Alvarious
Reviews.Content: So far so good. The android is not as friendly a suppose it would be, and still have problems with my fat fingers on the touch screen. But the tablet has a good processor, thus a very good time answer. I like the "writte-to-voice" feature. And makes my daughter wants to write.Pictures ar good. screen definition is great.I was used to MS Office, so still got some problems with the Open Source Office, but is great.Making long short, is a very good device. I like it so much.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: william
Reviews.Content: el producto cumplio con mis requerimientos y lo recomiendo a todo el publico en general. muy satisfecho en pocas palabras

Reviews.Title: Great product but no update to ICS
Reviews.Author: michael yung
Reviews.Content: I bot the galaxy tab 8.9 4G version. The only reason I gave it a 3 stars not a 5 it because this tab has no update. The tablet work great but an't run a lot of the new app like Flipboard and etc.

Reviews.Title: Need a refund
Reviews.Author: Frank J. Gutmann
Reviews.Content: I ordered a new tab & I got one that appeared repackaged. To make it worse the Tab & instructions were in spanish.I have sent it back for a refund but have not receved any notice, I know they got it because of the tracking by UPS said they delivered it to them. where is my refund,I am getting angree. & you'r card will probably charge me intrest. Please look into this or I will never order from AMAZON again. FRANK

ProductInfo.Features:
2G Network	GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 3G Network	HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100
DISPLAY	Type	PLS TFT capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors Size	800 x 1280 pixels, 8.9 inches (~170 ppi pixel density)  	- Multi-touch input method - Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate - TouchWiz UX UI - Three-axis gyro sensor - Touch-sensitive controls
CAMERA	Primary	3.15 MP, 2048x1536 pixels, autofocus, LED flash Video	Yes, 720p Secondary	Yes, 2 MP
OS	Android OS, v3.0 (Honeycomb) CPU	Dual-core 1GHz ARM Cortex-A9 processor, ULP GeForce GPU, Tegra 2 T20 chipset
- SNS integration - Digital compass - TV-out - MP4/DivX/Xvid/H.264/H.263 player - MP3/WAV/eAAC+/OGG player - Organizer - Image/video editor - Quickoffice HD editor/viewer - Google Search, Maps, Gmail, YouTube, Calendar, Google Talk, Picasa integration - Adobe Flash 10.2 support  - Voice memo - Predictive text input (Swype)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Tab 8.9 3G P7300 16GB Unlocked GSM Android Tablet (White)
